Klaus Mueller.description:
continuing to work on his research project at the Oak Hill College library. He is deep in thought and focused on his work.

[(ID:5mR8J7) Tuesday February 14 -- 04:00 PM] Activity: Klaus is back at his desk, continuing to work on his research paper. He is determined to finish strong and meet his deadline.
